messages.content:
Q: Hows your day going so far?
A: Not bad, thanks for asking!

Q: First off how is your quarantine going? hope you are staying safe and inside.
A: Quarantine is going well. We are all staying safe. I no longer know what sunlight looks like

Q: Do you plan on adding chests? / Do you know anything about (or when) slime balls and/or pistons getting added to the game? / When is obsidian coming back?

A: Some blocks are a little tricky for us to bring into MCE. We've been working with all these blocks for a long time, making sure they work properly for AR and for MCE. They are almost there, just some more tweaks needed!

Q:Can We Kill Other Players?
A: NO! That is not only illegal IRL, but in-game you can bring them down to 1 health point but not kill them.
Q: Q: What is the best thing you have eaten since wfh?
A: Soft pretzels from Eastern Standard Provisions

Q: What is a community manager?
A: Think of a community manager as a conduit between the community and the development team. We wear many hats, but at the end of the day we want to be an advocate for the community to the team and make sure you know your voice is being heard.

Q: How does sun and sky look like?
A: I have no idea, I have forgotten :pepehands:

Q: When will the other crafting/smelting slots open up???
A: In one of the future updates. *Soon* or Soon™️

Q: What is the best thing you have eaten since wfh?
A: I've been cooking through recipes from Food Wars! The Apple Risotto is great

Q: What do you guys think of dungeons?
A: Played it all evening yesterday. It's RAD!

Q: What do you guys think of dungeons?
A: Love it! Haven't stopped playing since it launched 😄

Q: What do you guys think of dungeons?
A: I think it´s amazing, I was up until 6am playing! Like a teenager.

Q: How far out is the MCE development roadmap planned out?  How much does it change (eg introducing Adventure Crystals earlier than planned). 
A: We plan features 3-6 months in advance, and refine our plans as we get closer to releasing a feature.  Sometimes things change though, and we get a great idea and jump the queue, so to speak.

Q: What do you guys think of dungeons?
A: Dungeons is awesome! We are super happy for the team to share their work with the world

Q: Will you ever add villagers and villager trading?
A: We´re thinking about something like that quite soon. Those 1M piles of cobblestone have to go somewhere. We basically need more sinks in the game.

Q: Will enchanting table and enchanting join mce?
A: We're working towards adding all Vanilla features to Minecraft Earth. They will make their way to MCE in their own flavor

Q: Is snapshot not released today because you'll are playing dungeons??
A: The Earth team, Dungeons team and Vanilla teams are all their own teams, so nope, what we do doesn't impact snapshots.

Q: Can you guys start a yt channel with videos answering wuestions and awesome content for the community to enjoy, (which will inturn boost the popularity and discoverability of mce)
A: We actually share the YouTube channel with the larger Minecraft franchise and we do have content there! https://youtu.be/HEYq1qNQVXg

embeds.title: Ask Mojang #7: Minecraft Earth Edition!
embeds.description: Can you travel to the Nether in Minecraft Earth? Will muddy pigs and Mooblooms ever be added to the base game? When will we add more levels? And what on earth was the inspiration behind Minecraft Earth? In the seventh episode of Ask Mojang!, we’re taking a closer look at Minec...

messages.content: Q: Wither?
A:

Q: What is the best thing you have eaten since WFH?
A: Totinos pizza rolls because I am living my inner childhood again and think we are in the 90s

Q: Are your dev meetings very professional or is it just like talking to a whole group of people who love the same game
A: Yes, both! It is so much fun working with a group of people that share the same passion!

Q: Do you expect the game to release this year or next year? Early Access is there for so much time!
A: We haven't selected an exact time to move out of Early Access yet.  We only get one shot to "release" and want to make sure the game is as fun as possible for all types of players before doing so.

Q: It’s not a good time with the pandemic going on, but have you guys thought of added a system that simply rewards players for walking/getting physical activity?

A: Its a really tough design challenge. We could reward players for walking, but that also means players that are differently abled may be excluded. Some players don't live in walkable areas, or have parental permission to go on their own. There is a ton of data we look at when deciding how we change and update things, making sure to take all players into account.

Q: Who is the biggest meme machine on the team.
A: I dont want to brag but....

Q: will there be obsidian?
A: Eventually, but we took it out because we don´t have the nether yet and it had no purpose.  In a early prototype I actually built a portal on my buildplate, set it on fire and moved my phone through, and wound up in the nether. No one had put it there, it was just there beecause we´re using minecraft source code. but it was broken in many ways, so when we do add the nether we need ot do it properly.

Q: I LOVE THIS GAME!! do you?
A: I do!  I play it every day and honestly enjoy it more and more with each new feature.

Q1: once the world has completely come out of covid-19 lockdown, what’s the plans for adventures? Will private adventures stay, and will public adventures make a return?
A: The crystal adventures will stay. About Public Adventures, its too soon to say, but most most likely yes.

Q2: some items are only obtainable from purchased build plates like coal ore and a couple of flowers, the ocelot etc. will they become available by other means?
A: Yes. Some are part of season rewards and there will be ways to obtain all these items.  

Q3: tappables often time-out, are you looking into improving the server performance?
A: We are constantly improving. Thank you for the feedback! 

Q4: will we ever be able to increase the size of 32x32 build plates in build mode? They can be too small to work with, especially in tight spaces. Pinch to zoom?
A: We are watching all channels for feedback. We have considered a few options, so maybe soon. 

Q5: will build plates ever function when they aren’t open? Eg, crops growing
A: This is something we are also working on.

Q: Did you guys get an early copy of dungeons?
A: I personally did beta testing for it. I am not sure about everyone else

Q: Can You Fix THe Bug Where You Break Dark Wood And it Turns To Acia wood
A: Yes, this is on it's way!

Q: How can I become a mod, or community assistant?
A: We typically look for people in the community who participate and contribute to the community in a positive way. When there's a need to bring on more moderators to the ranks, we first look at our community assistants who have been engaging and providing a positive experience to our community

Q: Who is the biggest meme machine on the team.
A: @Pyroclasm has big zoomer energy

Q: Can you do my schoolwork for me?
A: Yes, just deposit 8 bitcoin into my dropbox and a zip file with picture of homework. Once received, will send link shortly to results.

Q: I LOVE THIS GAME!! do you?
A: YES! I have my phone out most of the day tapping away and getting killed in adventures (I play a lot but that doesn't mean I am good at it).

Q: Will you add Minecraft to Minecraft Earth?
A: Ummm. Maybe, if everyone demands it

Q: Q5: will build plates ever function when they aren’t open? Eg, crops growing
A: We´re thinking about how to do this. It might be cool if you leave a mob of me on it that it somehow ticks. More mobs of me, more ticking. We want to do it, believe us.

Q: What’s everyone’s plans for this week?
A: Both of my bosses are in this Q&A so I will be VERY BUSY THIS WEEK, YES VERY BUSY

Q: Do you guys have plans for more IRL events?
A: Once the world goes back to (more) normalcy, ABSOLUTELY!!

Q: Did you guys get an early copy of dungeons?
A: Yes we did. Sorry! Perks of the job!

Hi Skarl, here are your answers and thank you for your great questions:

Q: Do you expect the game to release this year or next year? Early Access is there for so much time!
A: We continue to polish refine and add new features to the game. When we feel it is ready then we will move out of early access.

Q: Will there be a Fourth of July mob?
A: Since it is not an international holiday, probably not. We don't want to feature too heavily on one culture since Minecraft is for everyone!

Q: Are we close to a nether update? Quartz and glowstone being added seems like a hint for what is to come...
A: We are constantly reviewing the updates and new additions to vanilla / bedrock and plan to add them to MCE when it makes sense.

Q: Do you know anything about armor being added? (I think it wouldn’t need to be equipped by players, at least not in the start, armored mobs would give a potencial harm and difficulty to those epic adventures).
A: We love the idea of armor and want to add it adventures.

Q: Are we ever going to have skeleton wolf as season reward? I am struggling to find him (chances are too low and I can’t leave home).
A: We have designed very exciting rewards for the upcoming seasons. There is a Bone Spider in season 2 so who knows that will be in season 3 🙂 

Q: Do you know anything about (or when) slime balls and/or pistons getting added to the game?
A: We really love slimes and pistons as they allow for great redstone contraptions. We might be testing these right now 😉

Q: Can we get a 60fps toggle for high end devices?? 😳
A: All devices try to run 60fps in AR. Locked to 30fps in map. Android devices only update the video in 30fps but the rendered part in AR updates at 60fps on higher end devices actually.

Q: Why neither tall grass or mossy cobblestone slab are obtainable in game? (You can find but not collect them, tall grass by bonemealing grass and mossy cobblestone slab in one of the epic adventures).
A: We will look into this, thanks for pointing it ou.

Q: If enchanting tables were to be added to the game, would they be together with the crafting table and furnace in the crafting/smelting menu or would they be a block, needing 15 bookshelves for the best (30 level) enchantments?
A: If we add enchanting it would appear in the make stuff screen. You highlight an interesting design challenge though. How do we make the bookcases add to the power of the table?  :)

Q: When is obsidian coming back? It is a nice block, not affected by explosions, adds new color paletes to players that like building and is a nice way to use the lava gathered in adventures.
A: We are working on how Obsidian works within MCE and will consider returning it to the game probably when we add the Nether.

Q: Why we can’t craft snow from snow balls? @Flexology 
A: Good question we will look into that

Q: (In vanilla Minecraft, you can only craft snow with 4 snow balls, while top snow to snow recipe doesn’t exist, also snow is crafted into 3 top snow instead of 8).
A: looking into it. Thank you.

Q: Will we ever have tables as blocks (crafting table, furnace etc)?
A: Yes we are considering how adding tables as blocks would work on buildplates. We have ideas :)

Q: Do you plan on adding chests? (We would need them to make hoppers and shulker boxes one day, also hoppers are really useful as redstone component and making accurate clocks spending less resources).
A: Redstone contraptions are awesome. We want hoppers, chests etc. We just need to think carefully about how this works with AR and on buildplates.

Q: Are we ever going to be able to add friends in the game? A friend list would be really cool.
A: Friends are super important for many features that we are considering for the future. This is definitely on our list for investigation.

Q: How Can I Become A Minecraft Staff?
A: When you join the Minecraft Earth team here at Mojang Studios and you want to hop onto Discord (and you have your manager's approval) then you can become a Minecraft Staff here on Discord!

Q: What features do you want to see added in MCE?
A: A clever use for diamond and gold shovels, since I had to make them to fill out my journal.

Q: What features do you want to see added in MCE?
A: CATS

Q: will the jolly llama come back?
A: Maybe. Or maybe something BIGGER.

Q: Can I have 1000 free rubies? J
A: No problem. Send 6 bitcoin to my hotmail address and I will send you a link shortly via SMS.

Q: What features do you want to see added in MCE?
A: Sus eyes for mobs :eyes_sus:

Q: What do you guys plan for halloween
A: So, we have this cursed sheep...

Q: Will AR or a fishing feature be available in the future?
A: Wouldn't that be amazing! So immersive and fun, gosh I would play that so much 😉

Q: WHATS THE UPDATE ON FISHING
A: Oh jeez how many prototypes have we done for fishing at this point... Its a complicated one! We haven't found one that feels *just right* yet, but we are getting close!

Q: Are we ever going to be able to add friends in the game?
A: We are looking at that, not in the short term, but in the mid term we are. Curious what you would like to see in that feature, what would being someone's friend allow you to do?

Q: Have you planned to join more Tappable types? Including season and festival-specific Tappablethinking
A: More types, Yes!

Q: Have you guys been enjoying quarantine life with animal crossing?
A: More Terraria (1.4) for me, along with starting Minecraft Dungeons.  I hear AC is good though :).

Q: x^2 - 6x = 16 
A: quadratic formula always works

Q: Have you guys been enjoying quarantine life with animal crossing?
A: Can confirm a lot of us here have been enjoying with Animal Crossing :nookbouncedance:

Q: W H E A T ?
A: 🇼 🇭 🇪 🇦 🇹 ❓

Q: Have you guys been enjoying quarantine life with animal crossing?
A: Oh yeah, many of us play and visit each other when we have those sweet sweet turnip prices.

Q: Have you guys been enjoying quarantine life with animal crossing?
A: I have been enjoying living vicariously through all my friends who are enjoying animal crossing. Also, it's been watching Animal Talking with Gary Whitta; highly recommend! 😄

Q: Will there be a Fourth of July mob?
A: Since 4th is July is still just a USA holiday ( until Jeff Goldblum uploads the virus and saves us ), we probably won't since we try to focus on holidays that are celebrated worldwide or by many countries rather than just one.

Q: Who designs the character art? how often do new pieces get designed?
A: We have a great art team and there are different sub teams for different parts. We have artists for characters, mobs, UI, blocks etc. These are developed constantly as we are always adding new content to the game. There is a new mob every 2 weeks!

Q: Why are all the jobs on mojangs website for Stockholm?
A: The USA jobs are on the Microsoft website...

Q: This math problem has me stumped can you help me? Decide which method to use for solving this equation: x^2 - 6x = 16 
A: X = 8

Q: Do you think we will ever get a map that has a day/night cycle based on the players actual time
A: We've talked a lot about this, but haven't settled on the best way to incorporate day/night.  Matching the real day/night might encourage people to play at night, which is dangerous.  Having it be a 20 minute cycle and not match what you see outside would feel odd.  We're still thinking.

Q: Have you guys been enjoying quarantine life with animal crossing?
A: I think we've all been enjoying Animal Crossing quite a bit. Fantastic game and we're all banding together to get an edge on the Turnip market.

Q: This math problem has me stumped can you help me? Decide which method to use for solving this equation: x^2 - 6x = 16 
A: Quadratic, and make sure to carry the 1! 😉

Q: How do you guys feel about the ability to pets mobs via the interact tool? Let me pet my muddy pig! :merl_wave: :muddy_pig2:
A: That is a really cute idea! :Smileth:

Q: can we be friends? I wanna be friends
A: you are already my friend :pikaheartbig:

Q: Do you all work from home (normally) or at an office? If at an office, in which country?
A: Normally, the Minecraft Earth team would work from an office in Redmond Town Center, in Redmond which is a suburb of Seattle. We also work with the Stockholm team, but the core dev team is in Redmond. Right now we're all working from home.

Q: Do you all work from home (normally) or at an office? If at an office, in which country?
A: Normally work at an office in Redmond, WA! Right now, my dogs have been getting a lot of attention since I have been wfh

Q: Do you all work from home (normally) or at an office? If at an office, in which country?
A: What @torqObsidian said. I think we all miss each other a lot!!

Q: Will specific drop rates and rarity percentages be revealed at some point?
A: Probably not, they also change all the time! More often than you'd think.

Q:What Is The Bots Role Only Pyroclasm Has It?
A: I am not a robot, I am a real person with real feelings! At least that is what my creator told me...

Q: can "Mob of Me" be made to act like a hopper on a build plate, picking up items for you?
A: We have this CRAZY MASSIVE list of all the things we want Mobs of Me to be able to do! Some of them are more useful than others (I really want it to sing Opera but other team members said no). We just got some other things we want in the game first before we tackle Mob of Me updates!

Q: how will I be able to complete the journal if the jolly llama is not coming back?
A: Well we can't have you not finishing your journal can we 😛

Q: Will specific drop rates and rarity percentages be revealed at some point?
A: It wouldn't be very Minecraft-y if we did that.  We let our community figure out the math in our games and post it to sites and wikis if they like.

Q: i speak spanish
A: Hola!

Q:Who designs the adventures… and what qualifications are needed for that job? It seems incredibly fun!
A: It is fun and thanks for the question! 🙂 We have a team of highy skilled designers that love the challenge of creating bite sized pieces of Minecraft for players to explore. The qualifications you would need are: A love for Minecraft, a good understanding of redstone, attention to detail and most important, a great imagination to thinking up the next great Adventure! 🙂

Q: Do you guys ever go to "Malt and Vine" at lunch/after work?
A: Yes, fun place! They have the gyro place next door which is pretty tasty, and they have delicious....water

Q: Have You Guys Got Midnight Chicken Yet?
A: I found it the day it came out, in Los Angeles. No dev sploits! Just a lot of chicken tapping.

Q: how many people are on the team working from RTC?
A: Right now, none of us!

Q: how many people are on the team working from RTC?
A: None!

Q: Do you know how cool you are and an inspiration to all of us?
A: We do our best to give you guys the best experience. Its an inspirational loop!

Q: Have You Guys Got Midnight Chicken Yet?
A: I haven't found the Midnight Chicken yet, I'm still hunting. I keep getting common chickens!

Q: What your favourite mob not including the muddy pig?
A: JOLLY LLAMA :jolly_llama_prancing:

Q: I love This Server
A: Yes?

Q: What should I do if I crafted normal quartz stairs in the seasonal challenge instead of smooth quartz stairs? Quartz is very hard to get
A: We know this is a potential issue and so we are increasing the amount of nether quartz in adventure  chests from today!

Q: What your favourite mob not including the muddy pig?
A: [REDACTED]

Q: how many people are on the team working from RTC?
A: Emily is correct, of course - we're all WFH.  But to answer your question, Minecraft Earth started out with only a handful of people, but has grown to over 100 - primarily based in Redmond.

Q: What your favourite mob not including the muddy pig?
A: The answer is always muddy pig.

Q: When did MCE first go into developement
A: We started prototyping properly in Jan 2018 I'd say. Well that's when I started. @Flexology was an intern the summer before and actually made a Unity prototype.

Q: What your favourite mob not including the muddy pig?
A: Rabbit

Q: What your favourite mob not including the muddy pig?
A: Tropical Slime

Q: Do you ever try tapping chickens and cows in real life? They never seem to pop into my inventory when I try
A: Tapped on some cows playing Dungeons. They did not end up in my inventory...

Q: What your favourite mob not including the muddy pig?
A: I do love the midnight chicken but there is a nothing chicken coming soon that is my favorite and man its amazing

Q: Will day / night cycle exist and if so, will there be night exclusive mobs?
A: That would be cool. We didn't want to do a 24  hour day night cycle, because of kids and their beddtimes. But we weren't sure about 20 minute cycles. I actually think that would be pretty cool and we have part of the tech now, same as we use in the night mode build plates. Would you like that?

Q: Villagers exist virtually, but can they also exist AR-tually?
A: :haHAA: maybe

Q: Do you play MCE yourself in your free time?
A: Yeah i play a lot of adventures in my free time. My 2am Vanilla Minecraft gameplay is now heavily replaced with MCE

Q: Do you play MCE yourself in your free time?
A: Yes, absolutely. And then post on the internal slack whenever something is wrong, missing or when we have cool ideas. ( or not so cool ideas! )

Q: Are you aiming for complete parity like Bedrock and Java are? Aka features and blocks but tweaked for AR
A: Yes, for the most part. Though if you jump in Lava while playing MCE, can't confirm you will respawn in real life.

Q: Can someone be a part of the team, but not have to work in the office? (I live in europe)
A: It's always a possibility as long as there's a position posted. Some positions can be done a bit more remotely and we're seeing this more in our new normal right now. However, with that said, the majority of our team is in the Redmond area where our office is.

Q: When and how will we get the enderman since it was in the MCE loading photos
A: We implemented them but they disappeared. We can't find them, can you?

Q: Will the nether somehow ever be a thing in MCE?
A: Yes we envision bringing in the nether, but it would be a big expansion. Perhaps your entire map changes, and your UI and your inventory is different in the nether and the real world. It would have to be pretty hard core.

Q: When is [redacted] getting added?
A: [Redacted]

Q: When did MCE first go into development
A: Since Minecraft Earth is based on the Minecraft (Bedrock) engine, that's a more complicated question than you might expect.  @Flexology worked on the first AR prototype 3'ish years ago, but that pre-dates "Minecraft Earth" by a fair bit.  The original dedicated team was formed around 2.5 years ago, give or take.

Q: you all use slack and not teams?
A: We actually use both! There's a lot of cross-collaboration going on!

Q: When is [redacted] getting added?
A: I'm hoping by [REDACTED], but considering how long it took to get [REDACTED] out before that, probably a little longer than that

Q: When is [redacted] getting added?
A: It's in, just go to [REDACTED] and press [REDACTED]

Q: What's the office like?
A: We don't know!

Q:What's the office like?
A: ATM, it is empty.

Q: Do you still remember the way to your office?
A: Well, first I get out of bed... then I walk to my desk

Q: you all use slack and not teams?
A: We use both. Right now nine of us are on a teams call talking about the answers.

Q: Will the map ever get more details? (desert/snow/swamps)
A: We are very excited about the idea of biomes on the map. It would be a big feature and so it needs a lot of design and thought. Keep watching.

Q: What's the office like?
A: Right now, quiet? Normally, super fun and bustling!

Q: Can I play Minecraft Earth on Mars?
A: Yes you can, but the tappables are super sparse.

Q: Any possibility of adding achievements in game? Maybe badges you can earn by getting high enough stats? Like a gold mob badge for collecting 5000 mobs?
A: This is a great idea. Players should be able to show their great accomplishments.

Q: We want merl and PB to be final boss 😄
A: Finally we know what to put in Legendary crystals.

Q: Can I play Minecraft Earth on Mars?
A: No, however you COULD play Minecraft Mars on Earth....but you have to be on Mars to download it.

Q: What do you guys think about shaders?
A: All of the work being done with ray tracing is INCREDIBLE! Its amazing to see how far game tech has come in the last ten years (remember when PBR was the end all, be all?). 
As to my personal opinion, I will always pick a blinn over a lambert or a fong

Q: I'm going to tell your boss on you, you all scared?
A: N..No...

Q: one word question: pets?
A: 2 cats, one named Korben and one named Roxy.

Q: RTX + MCE?
A: Phone on fire.

Q: one word question: pets?
A: I have 3 long haired minature dachshunds

Q: What's your least favorite colour
A: purple. GET THIS COLOR OFF OF ME :monkaS:

Q:On a rating of tropical slime to Pyroclasm, how muddy pig is developing?
A: :spotted_pig:

Q:On a rating of tropical slime to Pyroclasm, how muddy pig is developing?
A: Have I really become a unit of measurement? :pyroclasm:

Q: Where's the Jeb_ sheep?
A: In Java

Q: When are legendary adventures coming out??(I don't even have epic crystal tho)
A: Soon but not THAT soon.

Q: do people in your art department also make the discord emotes?
A: I sometimes bug an Artist to make Emotes. We use icons that they make. Many a times it is our wonderful mods who make some cool emotes too!

Q: Will we ever see any endgame boss
A: No, Thanos is not in MCE

Q: herobrine?
A: Has been removed

Q: I think Wumpus just asked but it reminded me too, are there any plans for Apple Watch support?
A: There was a hacked prototype made by one of our devs running on his watch. I would love it, but it's extra work and now we're focusing on the core game.

Q: Are you sure thanos isn't in Minecraft earth, he does sneak into places very easily
A: Well at least there are no fingers to snap since MC characters have stubs for hands.

Q: Are you sure thanos isn't in Minecraft earth, he does sneak into places very easily
A: Thanos doesn't really sneak anywhere. Have you seen him?

Q: What are the requirements to do what you guys do???

A: It varies! Some people have degrees in engineering and computer science, others come from art backgrounds, others have worked in other kinds of software before joining the game. Each job has different requirements that are met in all sorts of unique ways.

Q: how cool is midnight chicken in pyroclasm measurement unit?
A: 1000 :pyroclasm:

Q: Can we will play with friends from  a distance ?
A: We did think about remote play but we prioritized it down for something nice that's coming later this summer which we think you like better

Q: how cool is midnight chicken in pyroclasm measurement unit?
A: 4.

Q: Will there be any underwater adventures in the future?
A: Please don't play MCE underwater.  Unless you are in a submarine, in which case: awesome!

Q: After full release, will updates slow down?
A: No I think we'll always update this frequently. It's a bit annoying on Android that you need to download content every time we update, so we're fixing that and removing the content download part in Android.

Q: Will there be any underwater adventures in the future?
A: Yes, we are just waiting for more phones to be waterproof.

Q: Will there be any underwater adventures in the future?
A: Yes they are ready to release but we need the phones to be waterproof first

Q: PLEASE SPOIL WHATS COMING THIS SUMMER pls, I’ll give you all 0.001 piece of cobblestone if you do it!
A: Please deposit 7 bitcoin to my hotmail and I'll fax the secrets to you!

Q: PLEASE SPOIL WHATS COMING THIS SUMMER
A: a wicked sunburn for me

Q: Pyroclasm R YOu A Real Person
A: My circuitry requires that I answer YES

Q: Who writes the funny in game messages?
A: YOU SEE THAT, @ledski? SOMEONE FINALLY THINKS I'M FUNNY

Q: Y'all are watching love is war right? Latest ep right :PepeSpin:
A: :HayaThumbsUp:

Q: PLEASE SPOIL WHATS COMING THIS SUMMER pls, I’ll give you all 0.001 piece of cobblestone if you do it!
A: Ok, but you can't tell anyone...it's gonna be hot and sunny in most parts of the world.

Q: Do you play with two different accounts for testing dev stuff and also playing normally?
A: Most of us have two phones, one with the latest development version for testing and another with the live game. This allows us to review all the features before we release them.

Q: Are we real?  [paraphrased: Is this the real life?  Is this just fantasy?]
A: Caught in a landslide, no escape from reality.

Q: Are we real?  [paraphrased: Is this the real life?  Is this just fantasy?]
A: Caught in a landslide, no escape from reality.
AA: OPEN YOUR EYES

Q: is there a sound team too? where do the sound effects come from?
A: Yes, we have an amazing sound designer:  https://www.shaunyjangaudio.com/

embeds.title: Shauny Sion Jang (Shauny Jang Audio) | Home
embeds.description: Welcome to Shauny (Sion) Jang's personal website where you can check out her work and see what she is up to these days!

messages.content:
Q: Has there ever been any hilarious coding bugs when programming the game?
A: Sometimes coding is just making bugs then a game suddenly happens

Q: Do you know a game called Minecraft: Dungeons? i
A: Yes it's the reason I have not slept for two days

Q: Is this the final question @Pyroclasm?
A: I dont know, maybe?

Q: is this the final question?? Please tell me it is!!!
A: That's a good question

Q: legendary crystals: enderdragon, wither, and PB?
